review: visited for my wife bleeding problem. dr.jayashree treated with just medication and assured us surgery is not required. it was such a relief as all the other doctors insisted on surgery. now my wife is well and walking thanks to her and the staff there. place is maintained very well. excellent hygiene.

doctor is extremely friendly. visited for ultrasound and pap smear examination.  the whole process was so smooth. staff were very helpful and eased the whole process for me. 
well maintained clinic.
